description.value:
As you use your powers, radioactive molds and fungi consume your flesh, making you look (and feel) like a rotting, walking corpse.

Mild Backlash You take damage equal to your level as your body decays.

Moderate Backlash You take damage equal to your level and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2}.

Severe Backlash You take damage equal to twice your level and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 4}. You can't reduce the value of your sickened condition below 1 for 1 hour.
